## Description {#details}

Provides a cast trait that uses a defined pointer to pointer cast as a base for reference-to-reference casts.

Note that it does not provide castFailed and doCastIfPossible because a pointer-to-pointer cast would likely just return <code>nullptr</code> which could cause nullptr dereference. You can use it like this:

template &lt;&gt; struct <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/castinfo">CastInfo&lt;foo, bar &#42;&gt;</a> &#123; ... verbose implementation... &#125;;

template &lt;&gt; struct <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/castinfo">CastInfo&lt;foo, bar&gt;</a> : public <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/forwardtopointercast">ForwardToPointerCast&lt;foo, bar, CastInfo&lt;foo, bar &#42;&gt;&gt;</a> &#123;&#125;;

Definition at line 423 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/casting-h">Casting.h</a>.
